result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alvin Turan Dickerson III

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Alvin Turan Dickerson III appeared by video, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Thomas Hasle in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel.  Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for status of counsel in Branch PE.
Status conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.
No Contact Order signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with MMO (DOB 6/30/2004) or MO (DOB 4/2/1938)

Defendant Alvin Turan Dickerson III appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent appeared by video for Alvin Turan Dickerson III.  Prosecuting attorney Patrick T. Franken appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Alvin Turan Dickerson not in court.  Ryan Jay Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued. Upon arrest, defendant is ordered remanded to a commissioner. Court ordered any bail on deposit to be forfeited. Court makes a finding that there is a possible victim identified and stays the forfeiture order with restitution to be determined at close of case.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 4/14/22 @ 1p
